revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Sprout Tower |image = [[File:Sprout Tower.png|thumb]] |caption = An outside view of Sprout Tower. |tokens = 2,500 |location = Directly east of Violet City. }} '''Sprout Tower''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It initially has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 56,735 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
===Wild Encounters===
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Rattata.png|40px]] Rattata || [[File:Sage.png|40px]] Sage Nico || [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout, [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout, [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout |- | [[File:Sage.png|40px]] Sage Chow || [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout, [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout, [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Gastly.png|40px]] Gastly || [[File:Sage.png|40px]] Sage Edmond || [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout, [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout, [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout |- | [[File:Sage.png|40px]] Sage Jin || [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout |- | rowspan=2|[[File:Hoothoot.png|40px]] Hoothoot || [[File:Sage.png|40px]] Sage Neal || [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout |- | [[File:Sage.png|40px]] Sage Troy || [[File:Bellsprout.png|40px]] Bellsprout, [[File:Hoothoot.png|40px]] Hoothoot |- |}

<tab name="Debuff"> After Reaching Unova, the drop chance for items in Johto will be debuffed for any loot with a Tier rarer than Rare (ie: Epic, Legendary, Mythic).
